## Postdoc timelines - Gannt charts

### 3-5 year timeline (SSF)

Three to five year timeline for Stanford Science Fellows application.

```{r}
library(ganttrify)
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
